                                                     java.lang.String forEntity,
                                                     Task.TaskStatus taskStatus)
        Gets tasks for an entity using plan and task status
        Parameters:
        planId - the plan id
        forEntity - the entity id
        taskStatus - the task status Task.TaskStatus
        Returns:
        the set of tasks matching the above params

      • updateTaskStructureIdFromClient

        public boolean updateTaskStructureIdFromClient(java.util.List<Client> clients,
                                               java.lang.String attribute)
        This method updates the task structureId field with a value from the residence attribute field of a given client

        This is only done for tasks whose for field refers to a client's residence attribute field

        Parameters:
        clients - A list of clients
        Returns:
        bolean indicating whether the update was successful or not

      • updateTaskStructureIdFromStructure

        public boolean updateTaskStructureIdFromStructure(java.util.List<Location> locations)
        This method updates the task structureId field with a value from the location's id field of a given structure

        This is only done for tasks whose for field refers to a structure's id field

        Parameters:
        locations - A list of locations (structures)
        Returns:
        bolean indicating whether the update was successful or not

      • updateTaskStructureIdsFromExistingStructures

        public boolean updateTaskStructureIdsFromExistingStructures()
        This method updates the task.structure_id field with ids of existing structures where the structure._id equals the task.for value.

        This is only done for tasks that have a null structure_id field

        Returns:
        bolean indicating whether the update was successful

      • updateTaskStructureIdsFromExistingClients

        public boolean updateTaskStructureIdsFromExistingClients(java.lang.String clientTable)
        This method updates the task.structure_id field with structure_ids of existing clients where the base_entity_id equals the task.for value.

        This is only done for tasks that have a null structure_id field

        Returns:
        bolean indicating whether the update was successful

      • batchInsertTasks

        public boolean batchInsertTasks(org.json.JSONArray array)

      • getTasks

        public JsonData getTasks(long lastRowId,
                         int limit)
        Fetches Locations whose rowid > #lastRowId up to the #limit provided.
        Parameters:
        lastRowId -
        Returns:
        JsonData which contains a JSONArray and the maximum row id in the array of Clients returned or null if no records match the conditions or an exception occurred. This enables this method to be called again for the consequent batches

      • cancelTasksForEntity

        public void cancelTasksForEntity(java.lang.String entityId)
        Cancels tasks for an entity Cancels all tasks that have status ready @Task.TaskStatus
        Parameters:
        entityId - id of the entity whose tasks are being cancelled

      • archiveTasksForEntity

        public void archiveTasksForEntity(java.lang.String entityId)
        Archive tasks for an entity Archives all tasks that have status different from ready @Task.TaskStatus
        Parameters:
        entityId - id of the entity whose tasks are being archived
